**Describe the bug**
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

**What program generated your wav files?**
Please tell me what program generated your wav files.

**To Reproduce**
1. Please provide at least one link to a sample wav file that reproduces this issue. Make sure to follow copyright law and only link to material that you can legally share.
2. Please give the exact command line that reproduces the bug

**Expected behavior**
A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

Note: I follow the "no guessing games" rule when investigating bugs. Many bugs are due to the unique way you use soft_matrix, thus it requires extra care on your part to give me enough information to understand how to fix it.
